sections.text: The Bendheim Center for Finance offers the MFin program, providing advanced training in finance, economics, and data science to prepare students for leadership in global financial markets and policy institutions.

items: Electives in machine learning and FinTech
sections.text: The curriculum blends rigorous finance theory, quantitative methods, and electives in modern finance areas such as FinTech and machine learning.

items: Strong quantitative and economics background required
sections.text: Applicants are expected to have strong mathematical and statistical foundations.
Graduates pursue careers in investment banking, asset management, central banks, and quantitative finance.
